original_title: Beats of the Heart: The Romany Trail Part Two: Gypsy Music into Europe
overview: The Romany Trail Part Two is a penetrating, provocative tour of a fabled peopleâ€™s existence. It reveals the prejudice they still face daily and which they combat with the lyrics and music they have carried and adapted on their long migrations. Featuring: The music of Django Reinhardt, the ballads of the Holocaust, Hungarian folk musicians and professional restaurant bands, pipers and the greatest names in Gypsy entertainment.
title: Beats of the Heart: The Romany Trail Part Two: Gypsy Music into Europe
